name: The Curse of Coronavirus
description:
A post-apocalyptic game set in late 2020.  The entire planetary population has been almost wiped out by Coronavirus. You have to survive and fight with a new, much more powerful danger.

  •  Realistic combat mechanics with accurate ballistic properties.
  •  Advanced physics and an immersive storyline with a number of unique characters.
  • Face and survive the natural and supernatural threats.
